titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 4794) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1989, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-723.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 266 - 143 (Record Vote No: 206).

bill.summary: 6/22/1988--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 4794 (Department of Transportation and related agencies appropriations).
